options_batch_download.message: Batch download (download all media in current list)

options_batch_download_hint.message: Press (Tap) & Hold mouse (finger) for 1 second over the any download button in media list.

options_id3_fill_auto.message: Automatically fill ID3 tags if necessary

app_full_name.message: VK Music - download music from popular sites

app_description.message: Easy and fast browser extension, which allows you to download music from popular sites.

opt_in_data_collection.message: Please allow us to receive usage statistics of this addon. We respect your privacy and didn't store or share data for third parties.
